TEXT.TITLE: QUANTUM DIAGNOSTICS <QTMCU> GETS PATENT
TEXT.BODY: Quantum Diagnostics Ltd said it has been granted a patent for a new imaging technology it has developed that uses electrmagnetic radiation. It said it sees applications in airport security screening devices, medical diagnostic imaging systems and quality control devices. Reuter
